abstract: British authorities arrest three Libyans connected to April 1984 killing of police officer Yvonne Fletcher, including unnamed male suspect who was charged with conspiracy to murder; Fletcher was killed during demonstration at Libyan People’s Bureau on St James’s Square in London.
lead_paragraph: A Libyan man in his 50s was arrested Thursday on suspicion of conspiracy to murder the officer, Yvonne Fletcher.

headline.main: Britain: Libyan Tied to a Killing in 1984 Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Libyan Tied to a Killing in 1984 Is Arrested

snippet: A Libyan man in his 50s was arrested Thursday on suspicion of conspiracy to murder the officer, Yvonne Fletcher.
